Without resizing
Easy   Val AP: 0.9548215860300486
Medium Val AP: 0.9404687156148954
Hard   Val AP: 0.8443013514726418

With resizing 1600-2500:

Easy   Val AP: 0.9482588209755995
Medium Val AP: 0.9384611945256478
Hard   Val AP: 0.8960247330878501

With resize 1600-1600

Medium Val AP: 0.940767392864781
Hard   Val AP: 0.8870121567515131
